title: Controlled vs Uncontrolled Components
subject: React
theory:
## Managing Input Data

### Controlled Components (Recommended)
The React component controls the input. The source of truth is React State.
* Value differs from user input? No, Value IS State.
* Flow: State -> Input Value -> onChange (Update State).

### Uncontrolled Components
The DOM handles the form data. React accesses it via a Ref.
* Source of truth is the DOM.

examples.explanation: You can modify input in real-time.

common_mistakes.correction: This makes the field read-only because React forces the value to match the state (which never changes).

interview_questions.question: Which is better?
interview_questions.answer: Controlled components are generally preferred because they support instant validation and allow React to control the data. Uncontrolled are useful for integration with non-React code.

exam_notes: Controlled enables inputs like 'Type to search'.
summary: Controlled components give React full control over the form state.
